ygData.subject: Re: Lets find Bidl Frugin
ygData.msgSnippet: You may be thinking of Feddi Dooger, he spawns around the dragon bones, has a dagger of some sort.  Dressed in black leather I believe, runs up to you shouting
ygData.messageBody:
You may be thinking of Feddi Dooger, he spawns around the dragon bones, has
a dagger of some sort. Dressed in black leather I believe, runs up to you
shouting something about Meldrath and promptly tries to put his dagger
between under your ribs and pop your spleen. Sound like him?

At 01:17 PM 07/22/1999 -0700, you wrote:
>From: "Dennis Chan" <dchan17@...>
>
>i think ive seen this guy b4....i created a newbie character on Prexus
>server to see around and i saw this guy who is suppose to be Meldrath's
>servant ran toward me and killed me.
>
>Do u guys know a kobold would occasionally spawn on the mountain near the 2
>out- of-way houses that sell beer components?
>
>tha'ts where i saw him spawn.If u still dont' know what i am talking
>about..hug the right side mountain wall when u come outta town and kept
>going and u will see that kobold(doesn't spawn every time though)
>
>
>

> >soon as he spawns, much like Bandits will kill Giant Spiders and Bears in

> >Karanas. Not sure about this, but its a thought. Secondly, is the lens

>good
